actions.name: Send Out (Combat Start)
actions.description:
Effect: Using the method of their choosing, the user brings the targeted creature from their Team into combat.
Most commonly, this is used with releasing creatures stored in Balls, who may be sent out within 5m from the user, or 2m from a spot that the user Flings the Ball at.

actions.name: Send Out (Combat Start)
actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: Using the method of their choosing, the user brings the targeted creature from their Team into combat.
Most commonly, this is used with releasing creatures stored in Balls, who may be sent out within 5m from the user, or 2m from a spot that the user Flings the Ball at.
